candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (2 votes): ollama_llama: Commodity exposure through electric vehicle production and high retail interest. It aligns with high volatility, sector‑rotation (EV), and recent weakness patterns.

Swarm Consensus (2 votes): claude_haiku: Crypto mining with high volatility and strong trending behavior similar to SOL-USD. Canadian listing adds currency volatility layer. Mean reversion opportunities around technical support levels.; xai: HUT (Hut 8 Mining) is a crypto mining firm with operations in North America, akin to WULF and MARA in following Bitcoin cycles, high volatility, and energy/commodity exposure.
